activities: We provide a US address to facilitate the online purchases of international consumers.  Clients in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland provide us with their contact details (name, address, telephone and email) so that we may deliver their merchandise.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Currently in the process of becoming PCI compliant.
recoursemech:
BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints.

For unresolved complaints related to SkyShop Logistics’ human resources data, SkyShop Logistics will cooperate with the European Data Protection Authorities (DPAs).
